content: Family Savings Expenses Tracking Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Oct 2018Let's talk about budgeting apps. Any recommended apps you guys use to track your expenses and for budgeting? How do you sync your spouse's data together?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 19 Oct 2018There's actually an app called Honeydue that you can use. You and your spouse can both use it to track finances, and you'll be able to see what your spouse keys in anytime. It's not available in Singapore, but if you're using an Android device you should know what you can do ;)0 comments1
